author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Run the specified command on the remote system with SSH.
commands.name: ssh

commands.description: Copies the given file from Cortex XSOAR to the remote machine.
commands.name: copy-to

commands.description: Copies the given file from the remote machine to Cortex XSOAR.
commands.name: copy-from

integration.description: This integration transfers files between Cortex XSOAR and a remote machine and executes commands on the remote machine.
integration.name: RemoteAccess v2

description: Transfer files and execute commands via SSH on remote machines.
name: Remote Access
readme:
Transfer files between Cortex XSOAR and a remote machine, and execute commands on the remote machine.


## What does this pack do?
- Runs a specified command on the remote system with SSH.
- Copies the specified file from the remote machine to Cortex XSOAR.
- Copies the specified file from Cortex XSOAR to the remote machine.
